meanings.sent1: The foal ran playfully in the field.
meanings.sent2: The farmer admired the beautiful foal.
meanings.sent3: The foal's antics brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The foal's coat shone like polished copper.
meanings.sent5: The foal's whinny echoed through the meadow.

meanings.definition: To give birth to a foal
meanings.sent1: The mare will foal in the spring.
meanings.sent2: The farm is expecting the mare to foal soon.
meanings.sent3: The mare decided to foal right in the middle of the night!
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the mare to foal was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The vet was called to assist the mare in foaling.
